snippet: Commonwealth leaders must address human rights violations and denial of press freedoms that is undermining democracy in the country.
abstract: Editorial calls on leaders who are attending the Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting in Sri Lanka to insist that the country's government show meaningful progress in addressing human rights abuses; notes Pres Mahinda Rajapaksa has had a record of serious human rights violations and has failed to provide accountability for abuses during the country's civil war.
lead_paragraph: Commonwealth leaders must address human rights violations and denial of press freedoms that is undermining democracy in the country.
